name: submrcl

stmt.origin: mptrcl(hs0, c0, csubmnd, c1, cmnd, crab(hs1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wral(hs3, cv(hs1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))))))

body.origin:

-| wceq(csubmnd, cmpt(hs0, cmnd, crab(hs1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wral(hs3, cv(hs1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1))))))))
-| diffsc(hs0, cmnd)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Mnd)
⊣ SubMnd =(hs0 ∈ Mnd ↦ { hs1 ∈ P((Base ` hs0))|((0 ` hs0)∈ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, ∀(hs3 ∈ hs1,(hs2[(+ ` hs0)]hs3)∈ hs1)))})
⊣ d(hs0, Mnd)
